reviewText: This man knows how to inspire and show you the greatest workout method around..... oh yeah you should see him dance, wicked!!!!

I own just about every video ever made and I am so sick of all those workout videos that try to teach you how to lift your leg, I am not a dog. This video is great, it is full of energy and gets the job done. If you are the type that needs someone to hold your hand then hire a personal trainer. This is fun, fun, fun and what a sweat! This is a must have for anyone who gets bored doing the same old thing. Thank you for making such a fantastic video and I am looking forward to your next!

I bought this based on the other recommendations. This was 45 minutes of pure energy. The music kept me going, and the burn was great.
A definite must for those bored with all the others.
